QuestData.Title: Brace for Impact
QuestData.Description:
That's it for warming up. You and the other new recruits are a promising bunch, I'll tell you that much.
Hold on... what's that sound? I think something big is headed our way!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Captain Garrick inside the ship.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Captain Garrick inside the ship.
QuestData.RewardText:
This ship may not make it to the island.
Hold on to something sturdy and stick with your fellow recruits. We'll get through this.
